title: Hover
contents: Hover is a fast, amphibious propulsion for vehicles.
Hover propulsion provides very high maximum speeds and the ability to freely traverse water, which can be indispensable for finding unique attack routes.
However, they come at a higher production cost, provide little hitpoints, and are vulnerable to most types of damage.
Hover's high speeds and ability to traverse water make it perfect for hit-and-run attack vehicles.
Similarly to Wheels, however, they are poorly-suited for prolonged fights on the front line.
